mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo, l.instructor_id instructorId, l.location_no locationNo, l.lecture_name lectureName, l.lecture_limited lectureLimited, l.lecture_time lectureTime, l.lecture_price lecturePrice, l.lecture_startDate lectureStartDate, l.lecture_endDate lectureEndDate, m.member_name memberName, m.member_gender memberGender, GROUP_CONCAT(d.lecture_day ORDER BY l.lecture_no ASC) lectureDay FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON m.member_id = l.instructor_id JOIN lectureday d ON l.lecture_no = d.lecture_no GROUP BY l.lecture_no ORDER BY l.lecture_name
